long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This item simulates your clicks to make you work faster when you get on specific sites. This application only does this when you click the One-Click button in the extension popup menu. This application also needs to be able to run in incognito tabs to work to its fullest potential. It is made to simplify life and speed up your work with one click instead of 5 or 6 different clicks.

Update V1.1 Clicks notes button via page load.
Update V1.1.1 Minor Revision to fix previous upload.
